Items.Name: Emergency Teleportation Device
Items.Effect: Avoid all damage or being captured and teleport to your home

Items.Name: Emp Device
Items.Effect: Destroy any non Wall, Power obstacle

Items.Name: Ghost Program
Items.Effect: Ignore all but 1 Tag gained on any action or obstacle

Items.Name: Personal Shield
Items.Effect:
Can't be improvised. 

Gain 9 Max Health

Items.Name: Immortality Device
Items.Effect: You cannot be lowered below 1 Health

Items.Name: Automated Turrets
Items.Effect: Destroy any Human or Drone obstacle that's also Moving

Items.Name: Phasing Device
Items.Effect: Ignore the Stop and Damage effects of an Obstacle

Items.Name: Death Laser
Items.Effect: Destroy any Human or Drone obstacle after taking its effects, but you only take Half damage rounded down

Items.Name: Teleport Beacon
Items.Effect:
Can't be improvised. 

You may freely pick up or drop your beacon, you may pay 1 [^Energy] to teleport to your beacon ignoring all negative travel effects

Items.Name: Communication Device
Items.Effect: You may Bypass a Human and move that Human obstacle to any other place in the facility
